attributes.action: All members of the CPS and police service involved in the advice to NOT prosecute Jimmy Savile in 2009 should be sacked.
attributes.additional_details: This harks back to JS claims he had, and there is compelling evidence he had, senior police officers on his payroll.  Anybody involved in JS avoiding justice while he was alive MUST be suspect and MUST be removed from their position for, at the very least, GROSS MISCONDUCT IN A PUBLIC OFFICE
